org.deri.tarql

Class TarqlQueryExecution

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.deri.tarql.TarqlQueryExecution

  • public class TarqlQueryExecution
extends java.lang.Object
    The execution of a TarqlQuery over a particular CSV file. Results can be delivered written into a Model or as an iterator over triples.

    • Method Detail

      • modifyQuery

        private void modifyQuery(com.hp.hpl.jena.query.Query query,
               com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.algebra.Table table)
        Modifies a query so that it operates onto a table. This is achieved by appending the table as a VALUES block to the end of the main query pattern.
        Parameters:
        query - Original query; will be modified in place
        table - Data table to be added into the query
